sense.def:
A plot
je skriven načrt skupine ljudi, kako bodo naredili nekaj nezakonitega ali slabega.

seg.quote: Another plot to assassinate the General was uncovered.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
plot something
ali
plot to do something
, na skrivaj delajo načrte, kako bi nekaj storili.

seg.quote: They were accused of plotting to assassinate the President.
Anyone convicted of plotting against the king will be executed.

sense.def:
The plot of a film, novel, or play
je zgodba filma, romana ali igre in način, kako se razvija.

seg.quote: They were having some difficulty in following the plot.

sense.def:
A plot
je majhen kos zemljišča.

seg.quote: His land is split up into several widely scattered plots.

sense.def:
To plot the position or course of a plane or ship
pomeni označiti na zemljevidu ali karti, kje je letalo ali ladja ali v kateri smeri se premika.

seg.quote: They plotted the new positions of each vessel.

sense.def:
To plot the points on a graph
pomeni, da pri risanju grafa na pravih mestih označimo točke.
